titleStmt.title: Gods love to mankind manifested, by dis-prooving his absolute decree for their damnation.
titleStmt.author: Hoard, Samuel, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Hoard by STC (2nd ed.) and DNB.
Imperfect: stained, cropped, tightly bound, and with print show-through.
Reproductions of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
